plot: Two sisters have to make an important decision about their father, who they haven't talked to in a long time or at least one of them haven't.
title: Minimo
plot_es: Two sisters have to make an important decision about their father, who they haven't talked to in a long time or at least one of them haven't.
plot_en: Two sisters have to make an important decision about their father, who they haven't talked to in a long time or at least one of them haven't.
